attributes.action: Lose Human Rights when breaking the Law
attributes.additional_details: human rights are being used to shield law breakers who cause injury and death and on a less severe scale defraud taxpayers. The UK's generosity to all nationalities and faiths is now being abused by a small minority. Law abiding citizens uphold the principal of human rights BUT feel that death or injury caused by crime or defrauding the tax payer should immediately nulify any claim to human rights and mean an automatic return to their place of birth.
